Detailed Description

This sensor class is used to retrieve imu data

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AlleyHoopROSSensors::Imu::Imu ( std::string  _name,
ros::NodeHandle *  _nh,
std::string  _topic 
)

The constructor for the imu sensor class.

Parameters
_namethe name of the sensor, required by the base sensor class
_nhthe nodehandle to publish data on
_topicthe topic to retrieve imu data from such as accelaration, velocity and angular movement
